snippet: The Comcast unit said it had plans to build a 1,000-acre park to capitalize on China’s growing middle class.
abstract: Comcast's NBC Universal unit announces plans to build a $3.3 billion theme park in Beijing; 1,000-acre park will be part of effort to capitalize on China's growing middle class.
lead_paragraph: The Comcast unit said it had plans to build a 1,000-acre park to capitalize on China’s growing middle class.

headline.main: NBCUniversal Looks to Create $3.3 Billion Beijing Theme Park
headline.print_headline: NBCUniversal Looks to Create $3.3. Billion Beijing Theme Park
